name: Recently Beyond
description:
Made as part of a 1st semester school project at Dawson College for the Independent Video Game Design program. With my colleagues Ahreum Lee (ahreumlee.com) and Maxime Lenglet (https://www.artstation.com/negikun), we created a 3D platformer where you play as a ghost who's searching the beyond for their way into the afterlife.

It shouldn't take anyone more then about 5 minutes to play and we would love any and all feedback that you would like to share in the comments!

Movement (Keyboard & Mouse)
W / Up Arrow: Move Forward
S / Down Arrow: Move Backwards
A / Left Arrow: Strafe Left
D / Right Arrow: Strafe Right
Spacebar: Jump
Mouse: Controls Camera Movement and Rotation of the Ghost
Escape: Pause Menu While In-Game

Credits
Ahreum Lee - Art/Modelling/Animation/Game Design
Damien Mojzak - Programming/QA/Project Management/Game Design
